page.title: 03Local Dialect 1.
page.content:
As in many other villages Culmstock has it's own local dialect which is difficult for an outsider to understand.Outsider in this case meaning someone who has not been living in the village for at least twenty years!Although still used there is an increasing risk that many of these expressions will be lost to general usage.The spelling in many cases is open to variation as is the pronunciation.
{AMESES }Wood and metal curved frame round horse collar {AVEERED } Afraid { {BACKSIEVOR }Back to front
{BIST } Are
